verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> And the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> of man מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> how יִּֽהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become עֵץ־ <S%H6086><s%> tree הַגֶּ֖פֶן <S%H1612><s%> What is the vine מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any עֵ֑ץ <S%H6086><s%> more than any tree הַזְּמוֹרָ֕ה <S%H2156><s%> [or than] a branch אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which הָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> is among בַּעֲצֵ֥י <S%H6086><s%> which is among the trees הַיָּֽעַר׃ <S%H3293><s%> comb

הֲיֻקַּ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> be taken מִמֶּ֙נּוּ֙ <S%H4480><s%> Can עֵ֔ץ <S%H6086><s%> Shall wood לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <S%H6213><s%> thereof to do לִמְלָאכָ֑ה <S%H4399><s%> anything אִם־ <S%H518><s%> or יִקְח֤וּ <S%H3947><s%> can take מִמֶּ֙נּוּ֙ <S%H4480><s%> at יָתֵ֔ד <S%H3489><s%> a pin לִתְל֥וֹת <S%H8518><s%> of it to hang עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any כֶּֽלִי׃ <S%H3627><s%> any vessel

הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> If לָאֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> into the fire נִתַּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> Behold it is cast לְאָכְלָ֑ה <S%H402><s%> for fuel אֵת֩ <S%H853><s%> שְׁנֵ֨י <S%H8147><s%> both קְצוֹתָ֜יו <S%H7098><s%> the ends אָכְלָ֤ה <S%H398><s%> devoureth הָאֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> the fire וְתוֹכ֣וֹ <S%H8432><s%> of it and the midst נָחָ֔ר <S%H2787><s%> of it is burned הֲיִצְלַ֖ח <S%H6743><s%> Is it meet לִמְלָאכָֽה׃ <S%H4399><s%> business

הִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> Behold בִּֽהְיוֹת֣וֹ <S%H1961><s%> become תָמִ֔ים <S%H8549><s%> Behold when it was whole לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> is not יֵֽעָשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> it was meet לִמְלָאכָ֑ה <S%H4399><s%> for no work אַ֣ף <S%H637><s%> How כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> when אֵ֤שׁ <S%H784><s%> when the fire אֲכָלַ֙תְהוּ֙ <S%H398><s%> hath devoured וַיֵּחָ֔ר <S%H2787><s%> it and it is burned וְנַעֲשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> how much less shall it be meet ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> still לִמְלָאכָֽה׃ <S%H4399><s%> yet for [any] work ס

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which עֵץ־ <S%H6086><s%> tree הַגֶּ֙פֶן֙ <S%H1612><s%> As the vine בְּעֵ֣ץ <S%H6086><s%> among the trees הַיַּ֔עַר <S%H3293><s%> of the forest אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נְתַתִּ֥יו <S%H5414><s%> which I have given לָאֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> to the fire לְאָכְלָ֑ה <S%H402><s%> for fuel כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> so נָתַ֔תִּי <S%H5414><s%> so will I give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <S%H3427><s%> the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem

וְנָתַתִּ֤י <S%H5414><s%> And I will set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פָּנַי֙ <S%H6440><s%> my face בָּהֶ֔ם מֵהָאֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> from [one] fire יָצָ֔אוּ <S%H3318><s%> against them they shall go out וְהָאֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> and [another] fire תֹּֽאכְלֵ֑ם <S%H398><s%> shall devour וִֽידַעְתֶּם֙ <S%H3045><s%> them and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> when אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God בְּשׂוּמִ֥י <S%H7760><s%> when I set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פָּנַ֖י <S%H6440><s%> my face בָּהֶֽם׃

וְנָתַתִּ֥י <S%H5414><s%> And I will make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land שְׁמָמָ֑ה <S%H8077><s%> desolate יַ֚עַן <S%H3282><s%> because מָ֣עֲלוּ <S%H4603><s%> because they have committed מַ֔עַל <S%H4604><s%> a trespass נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD פ
